Title: Scavolution
Description:
[h1] Scavenger Evolution [/h1]

[b]Scavolution[/b] is a mod which allows you to upgrade your scavengers by giving them certain items. Scavengers now have a new goal to deposit certain items in dens. After a sucessful deposit (or if the cycle ends with the item in their hand), the scavenger will [b]evolve[/b] into a new varient. Scavengers will express there gratitude by becoming friendly towards you after helping them evolve. You can use this to obtain items usually unobtainable or very hard to obtain for most Slugcats.

[b]Requires DLC (Either MSC or The Watcher)[/b] 

Current Recipes (Creature + Item  => Evolution)

Any DLC Upgrades
Scavenger + [b]Vulture/Elite Mask[/b] => [b]Elite[/b] Scavenger    
Scavenger + [b]Singularity Bomb[/b] => [b]Elite[/b] Scavenger

Watcher Upgrades
Scavenger + [b]Karma flower[/b] => Scavenger [b]Templar[/b]
Scavenger + [b]Boomerang[/b] => Scavenger [b]Templar[/b]
[b]Elite[/b] Scavenger + [b]Boomerang[/b] => Scavenger [b]Disciple[/b]
[b]Elite[/b] Scavenger + [b]Karma flower[/b] => Scavenger [b]Disciple[/b]
[b]Templar[/b] Scavenger + [b]Karma flower[/b] => Scavenger [b]Disciple[/b]
